message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $14000 for this exceptional product. Let me know if this offer suits your budget or if you'd like to discuss further details.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your offer. While I would like to accommodate your needs, I must respectfully decline your counteroffer. I am proposing an adjusted price of $13500 for the product. This reflects a compromise while still ensuring a fair return for us. I hope this revised offer aligns better with our business objectives.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $13500. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm glad you're finding the product valuable, Bob. I've considered your previous offers and am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $13200 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our interests. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and respect your offer. In light of our discussions, I am prepared to accept $13100 as the final price for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to agree on a final price of $13050 for the product. This represents a fair compromise for both parties involved.

I appreciate your continued flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $12900 for the product, which is the absolute maximum I'm willing to go. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to finalize the deal.
